1.text: This is the book of the generations of Adam. In the day that God created man, in the likeness of God made he him;

2.text: Male and female created he them; and blessed them, and called their name Adam, in the day when they were created.

3.text: And Adam lived an hundred and thirty years, and begat a son in his own likeness, and after his image; and called his name Seth:

4.text: And the days of Adam after he had begotten Seth were eight hundred years: and he begat sons and daughters:

5.text: And all the days that Adam lived were nine hundred and thirty years: and he died.

6.text: And Seth lived an hundred and five years, and begat Enos:

7.text: And Seth lived after he begat Enos eight hundred and seven years, and begat sons and daughters:

8.text: And all the days of Seth were nine hundred and twelve years: and he died.

9.text: And Enos lived ninety years, and begat Cainan:

10.text: And Enos lived after he begat Cainan eight hundred and fifteen years, and begat sons and daughters:

11.text: And all the days of Enos were nine hundred and five years: and he died.

12.text: And Cainan lived seventy years and begat Mahalaleel:

13.text: And Cainan lived after he begat Mahalaleel eight hundred and forty years, and begat sons and daughters:

14.text: And all the days of Cainan were nine hundred and ten years: and he died.

15.text: And Mahalaleel lived sixty and five years, and begat Jared:

16.text: And Mahalaleel lived after he begat Jared eight hundred and thirty years, and begat sons and daughters:

17.text: And all the days of Mahalaleel were eight hundred ninety and five years: and he died.

18.text: And Jared lived an hundred sixty and two years, and he begat Enoch:

19.text: And Jared lived after he begat Enoch eight hundred years, and begat sons and daughters:

20.text: And all the days of Jared were nine hundred sixty and two years: and he died.

21.text: And Enoch lived sixty and five years, and begat Methuselah:

22.text: And Enoch walked with God after he begat Methuselah three hundred years, and begat sons and daughters:

23.text: And all the days of Enoch were three hundred sixty and five years:

24.text: And Enoch walked with God: and he was not; for God took him.

25.text: And Methuselah lived an hundred eighty and seven years, and begat Lamech.

26.text: And Methuselah lived after he begat Lamech seven hundred eighty and two years, and begat sons and daughters:

27.text: And all the days of Methuselah were nine hundred sixty and nine years: and he died.

28.text: And Lamech lived an hundred eighty and two years, and begat a son:

29.text: And he called his name Noah, saying, This same shall comfort us concerning our work and toil of our hands, because of the ground which the LORD has cursed.

30.text: And Lamech lived after he begat Noah five hundred ninety and five years, and begat sons and daughters:

31.text: And all the days of Lamech were seven hundred seventy and seven years: and he died.

32.text: And Noah was five hundred years old: and Noah begat Shem, Ham, and Japheth.
